name: Absolute Poise
rules: Interrupt target ability or equipment card.
flavour: When they have no tools with which to fight, they will concede to your great might. - Codex of Defense

name: Aquatic Form
rules: You may complete quest cards from your graveyard. As you do, remove them from the game as an additional cost.
flavour: Both agility and endurance are necessary to act in harmony with what you desire to do under water. - Dendrite Starblaze

name: Arcane Spikes
rules: Your hero deals X arcane damage to target ally.

name: Aura of Accuracy
rules: You pay 1 less to play cards and effects with one or more targets, to a minimum of 1.
flavour: Let the Light guide your hand and you shall strike true.

name: Battle Tactics
rules: Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies must attack each turn if able. ;When an opponent proposes a combat, you may change the proposed defender. (It must be a legal choice for the attacker.)

name: Behead
rules: If target ally is damaged, destroy it. Otherwise, your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.
flavour: Fight at your best, or die like the rest! - Lord Benjamin Tremendouson

name: Blessing of Trials
rules: Attach to target ally. The next time it would be dealt damage by an opposing hero or ally this turn, prevent that damage and put that many strength counters on Blessing of Trials.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 ATK / +1 health for each strength counter.

name: Bloody Ritual
rules: As an additional cost to play, put 4 damage on your hero.;Draw four cards.

name: Celestial Communion
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally for each [Arcane] ally in your party. ; Draw a card.
flavour: I am merely the conduit. It will be all of you who will make us victorious this day. - Taheo Skyspeaker

name: Conjured Cinnamon Roll
rules: Ongoing: 1, Destroy Conjured Cinnamon Roll -> Your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each of your resources.;1 -> Target player gains control of Conjured Cinnamon Roll.
flavour: When you need a quick bite to eat.

name: Courageous Defense
rules: Draw a card.;Ongoing: Your hero is a Protector.

name: Cower
rules: If your hero is in combat, remove it from combat and ready it.;Ongoing: Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Creeping Shadow
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached character.

name: Crusader Strike
rules: Retribution Hero Required;Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to 3 plus the ATK of one of your Melee weapons. You may put an ongoing Judgement or Seal card from your graveyard into play.

name: Curse of Fatigue
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put a fatigue counter on Curse of Fatigue.;Attached character has -1 health for each fatugue counter.
flavour: You look tired.

name: Dawn's Grace
rules: Your hero heals 6 damage divided as you choose from any number of target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Let the Light alleviate any wounds you may have received in battle. - Marta Spires

name: Deathblow
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.)

name: Demolish
rules: Destroy target equipment.

name: Detect Traps
rules: Choose ability, ally, or equipment, and then target player reveals his hand and discards all cards of that kind.
flavour: No surprises here.

name: Drain Will
rules: Target player discards a card and you draw a card.
flavour: It's hard to think about anything else when they're tearing at your thoughts. - Deacon Markus Hallow

name: Eagle Sight
rules: Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one into hand and the other on the bottom of your deck.

name: Empty the Stables
rules: Search your deck for up to three Pet cards with different names, reveal them, and put them into hand.
flavour: My old friends. How good to see you again. - Shaii

name: Enduring Shout
rules: Ongoing: While exactly one ally is in your party, it has +2 ATK / +2 health and is a Protector.
flavour: Joo got dat wrong, mon. A good offense is da best defense.

name: Energized
rules: Ready target ally.
flavour: Let's go!

name: Engulfing Blaze
rules: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to each hero and ally.
flavour: I know what I'm doing! Just keep the priests ready!

name: Equalize
rules: Each player with more cards in play than you destroys cards in play he controls until he has the same number as you.
flavour: Let's level the playing field. - Boris Brightbeard

name: Exasperate
rules: Target player discards a card for each [Shadow] ally in your party.
flavour: By the time you feel the pain, it is already too late.

name: Feral Charge
rules: Feral Hero Required;Play only if your hero is in bear form. ; Interrupt target card.
flavour: The first mistake is assuming that bigger means slower.

name: Fire and Ice
rules: Your hero may deal 2 fire damage to target hero or ally, and it may deal 1 frost damage to a second target hero or ally. A character dealt frost damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Gang Up
rules: As an additional cost to play, exhaust two heroes and/or allies in your party.;Destroy target ally.
flavour: Chances are, you'll never see the second one.

name: Greater Chain Lightning
rules: Target up to five heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.
flavour: Don't stand so close to me! - The last words of Sordin Gumner, lead singer of the Azeroth Authority

name: Grounding Totem
rules: Ongoing: Opposing cards and effects must target Grounding Totem if able.
flavour: The elements will ensure our safe passage. - Zorin

name: Hibernate
rules: Put target non-token ally into its owner's resource row face down, then exhaust it.
flavour: Let sleeping beasts lie. - Eriun Moonglow

name: Hunter's Mark
rules: Attach to target hero. ;Ongoing: If attached hero would be dealt ranged or [Ranged] damage, it's dealt that much +1 instead.
flavour: Ah, there you are… - Sharpshooter Nally

name: Ice Lance
rules: Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally is ready.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
flavour: It's hard to nail a moving target. An immobile one, though…Now that's a different story. - Velindra Sepulchre

name: Immobilize
rules: Attach to target abililty, ally, equipment, or resource and exhaust it.
flavour: Stay!

name: Inspiring Light
rules: Your hero heals 8 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: A burst of the Light so you may continue the fight.

name: Life of the Land
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust], Destroy one of your resources -> Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: With great power comes the responsibility to use it sparingly.

name: Lightning Overload
rules: Elemental Hero Required;Ongoing: When you play a non-ongoing ability, destroy Lightning Overload. If you do, copy that ability. (You may choose new targets for the copy.)
flavour: Twice as nice.

name: Lose Control
rules: Target player discards a random card.

name: Master Instinct
rules: Ongoing: Your hero is in bear form.;[Exhaust] -> This turn, your hero loses bear form and is in cat form while you control Master Instinct.
flavour: Be flexible and ready to react to a changing battlefield. - Oakenclaw

name: Menace
rules: Put target ally on top of its owner's deck.
flavour: Some battles can be won on repuation alone.

name: Misery
rules: Shadow Hero Required; X, [Exhaust] -> Target player puts the top X cards of his deck into his graveyard.
flavour: The slower the death, the more agonizing the pain.

name: Moonflare
rules: Ongoing: When a resource enters play under your control, your hero may deal 1 arcane damage to target ally.
flavour: The enemy never counts on nature being your ally. - Yanna Dal'Shalan

name: Mystic Denial
rules: Interrupt target card.;Ongoing: When an opponent plays a card, destroy Mystic Denial. If you do, interrupt that card.
flavour: Let's see if this works on the third try. - Dizdemona

name: Natural Conduit
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target ally and heals 3 damage from itself.

name: Natural Disaster
rules: Your hero deals 6 nature damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Anything worth doing is worth overdoing.

name: Nature Unleashed
rules: Put five bear Ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and Protector.
flavour: The pain you suffer will be unbearable. - Grumpherys

name: Nerves of Steel
rules: Combat Hero Required; Ready your hero. It can't be exhausted by opposing cards and effects this turn.
flavour: Not even Gorebelly scares me.

name: Owned!
rules: Remove target ally from the game. Search its owner's deck, graveyard, hand, and party for all ally cards with the same name as that ally and remove them from the game.
flavour: Sit down!

name: Pandamonium!
rules: Put three Pandaren ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and This token has +1 ATK / +1 health for each other Pandaren in your party.
flavour: Storm, earth, and fire - heed my call!

name: Penance
rules: Each aly deals holy damage to itself equal to its ATK.
flavour: Those who have wronged will pay dearly.

name: Pernicious Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that your hero dealt combat damage to this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 3 nature damage to attached character.
flavour: The venom from a serpent is a minor inconvenience compared to what these rogues use.

name: Precognition
rules: Target opponent reveals his hand and chooses an ally card in it with cost X or less. Put that card into your party.
flavour: They think themselves strong, but they've been playing right into our trap.

name: Presence of Mind
rules: Arcane Hero Required;Cards in your hand are instant this turn until you play a card.
flavour: Impatience is a vitrue.

name: Primal Totem
rules: Ongoing: When one of your Totems is destroyed, it deals 1 nature damage to each opposing hero and ally.;(Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Pyroclastic Consumption
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: When attached hero is dealt fire or [Fire] damage, put an inferno counter on Pyroclastic Consumption.;At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached hero for each inferno counter.

name: Rain of Shadow
rules: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally. When a character dealt damage this way is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
flavour: You find yourself longing for the rains of the Wetlands. - Urrth

name: Ransack
rules: Destroy the card with the lowest cost among abilities, allies, and equipment in play. If two or more are tied, destroy all with that cost.
flavour: You won't be needing these.

name: Reprisal
rules: If damage was dealt with target ability or equipment this turn, destroy it.
flavour: No injustice should go unpunished.

name: Resourcefulness
rules: Survival Hero Required;Ongoing: Heroes and non-token allies in your party can be exhausted to pay costs as though they were resources.
flavour: Any problem can be solved with a little ingenuity.

name: Revitalize
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 2 damage from attached character.
flavour: It is the healing that allows me to continue fighting the good fight.

name: Revival Stone
rules: Attach to target ally in your party.;Ongoing: When attached ally is destroyed, put it from its owner's graveyard into your party with damage equal to its health minus 1.

name: Seal of Justice
rules: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.;1, Destroy Seal of Justice -> Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Seal of Righteousness
rules: Ongoing:Your Melee weapons have +1 ATK. ;Destroy Seal of Righteousness -> Your hero deals 2 holy damage to target ally.
flavour: There are no limits to what you can accomplish when you wield the light. - Grand Marshal Goldensword

name: Shadow Word: Anguish
rules: Your hero deals 5 shadow damage to target ally and 5 shadow damage to itself.
flavour: The further you delve into these arts, the greater the risk you place yourself in. - Spiritualist Sunshroud

name: Slashdance
rules: Each player may dance the way he imagines his hero would dance. If he does, he may turn his hero face up.
flavour: What a feeling!

name: Slay the Feeble
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: If a rogue is present, it's never a fair fight.

name: Snipe
rules: When the next ability, ally, or equipment enters play this turn, destroy it.
flavour: The first shot is always the most important. - Shaii

name: Spell Ricochet
rules: You may change the target of an ability card with a single target.

name: Spell Suppression
rules: Attach to target ability, ally, equipment, or resource.;Ongoing: Attached card loses and can't have powers.
flavour: I hope you weren't relying on that to defeat me. - Spellweaver Jihan

name: Sphere of Divinity
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Prevent all damage that attached ally would be dealt.;At the start of the turn, destroy Sphere of Divinity.

name: Sublimate
rules: Put each opposing ability and equipment into its owner's hand.
flavour: A warrior without weapons and armor is just flesh and blood. - Chancellor Velora

name: Sudden Shot
rules: You pay 1 less to play Sudden Shot for each other ability you've played this turn.;Your hero deals 3 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Surge of Adrenaline
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.);You pay X less to play Surge of Adrenaline.;Draw three cards.

name: Suspended Curse
rules: Attach to target ability, ally, or equipment.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, remove attached card from the game.
flavour: Go ahead… I'll wait.

name: Taunt
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: Attached character must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.
flavour: Your mother was a furbolg and your father smells of elekk turd! - Blaine Roberts

name: Temporary Dissipation
rules: Remove all allies in your party from the game. ; At the end of the next turn, put all cards removed this way into your party.
flavour: Now you see them…now you don't - Maginor Dumas

name: Thud!
rules: Exhaust target card in play. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Topple
rules: Destroy target ally attacking your hero.

name: Transfigure
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Target weapon's ATK becomes equal to its strike cost this turn.
flavour: Because I know something you don't know…I am not left-handed.

name: Turn the Blade
rules: Attach to target ally or weapon.;Ongoing: Attached card has -3 ATK.
reprinted: Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: You can fo more with a bow than just fire it. - The Greatest Race of Hunters

name: Unending Breath
rules: Ongoing: Play with the top card of your deck revealed.;You may complete quest cards from the top of your deck. As you do, remove them from the game as an additional cost.
flavour: You take my breath away - literally. - Umbrage

name: Unholy Power
rules: Demonology Hero Required;Demons in your party have +3 ATK / +3 health.
flavour: It is a tricky task to give a minion your power without relinquishing your soul in the process. - Pidge Filthfinder

name: Vampiric Tendrils
rules: Target player discards two cards. Your hero heals damage from itself equal to the combined cost of those cards.

name: War of Attrition
rules: Put any amount of damage divided as you choose on allies in your party. Each opponent divides that much damage among allies in his party. Players can't put more than fatal damage on an ally this way.

name: Water Breathing
rules: Ongoing: You may complete quest cards from your hand. As you do, remove them from the game as an additional cost.
flavour: There is no murloc that can hide from me.

name: Weapon Mastery
rules: Fury Hero Required;Ongoing: When you play a Melee weapon, put a strength counter on Weapon Mastery.;Your Melee weapons have +1 ATK for each strength counter.

name: Winterstorm Totem
rules: Ongoing: At the start of each opponent's turn, Winterstorm Totem deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally in that opponent's party. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: ALAMO
rules: OK, LISSEN, UDDER FRENDLY DURIDS HAF +1 FITE / +1 HEELTH. ; (Alamo is a Druid. Other friendly Druids have +1 ATK / +1 health.)
flavour: CAT DURID IS 4 FITE!

name: Alexi Barov
rules: At the start of your turn, put three Peasant ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and Ferocity. At the end of the next turn, destroy them.
flavour: Bow your head in my presence. I am a noble, after all, and you are a copperless peasant.

name: Al'lanora
rules: Shadowmeld (Elusive and Untargetable while ready.);[Exhaust] -> Interrupt target card unless its controller pays 1.
flavour: You have much to learn of how the world works.

name: Anguar Frostbeard
rules: Frost Resistance(Prevent all frost or [Frost] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: How about a nice taste of me arrow?

name: Boum Headshot
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
flavour: These reflexes and this gun have saved my hide more than once.

name: Braeden Nightblade
rules: Protector;Shadowmeld (Elusive and Untargetable while ready.)
flavour: The key is not letting the enemy know how big your army is.

name: Brelnor Mindbender
rules: When Brelnor enters play, gain control of target ally while Brelnor remains in your party.
flavour: Yer powers are weak!

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
rules: Protector;Other Tauren in your party have +10 health.
flavour: Ha! There's no need to coddle me, boy. I may be old, but I'm not helpless.

name: Catarina Clark
rules: Protector;[Exhaust] -> Catarina heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Those who embrace the Light are free to share it.

name: Centurion Addisyn
rules: Protector;As Addisyn enters play, choose arcane, fire, frost, nature, or shadow.;Addisyn has the chosen resistance.
flavour: Did you actually think you could cause me harm?

name: Chief Researcher Amereldine
rules: When you complete your first quest each turn, you may turn it face up if it's in play.
flavour: If you are not her to help the cause, get out.

name: Chief Researcher Kartos
rules: When you complete your first quest each turn, you may ready all resources exhausted to complete it.
flavour: Wonderful. This will help us in our battle against the Horde filth that have surfaced in Outland.

name: Consul Rhys Lorgrand
rules: Human Hero Required;Diplomacy: [Alliance] allies Rhys has +1 ATK / +1 health for each different [Alliance] race among allies in your party other than Human. (Draenei, Dwarf, Gnome, and Night Elf)
flavour: I count all among the Alliance as not only friends, but as brothers and sisters.

name: Cromarius Blackfist
rules: When Cromarius enters play, destroy target opposing ability if its controller has more abilities than you.
flavour: I envy you. But such a thing is not meant to last.

name: Cymbre Shadowdrifter
rules: Shadowmeld (Elusive and Untargetable when ready.)
flavour: Don't worry, it's just the leaves rustling. - The last words of Ertog Ragetusk, Splintertree Post Guard

name: Dagg'um Ty'gor
rules: Conspicuous (An opposing hero or ally may protect against this ally.)
flavour: Move ober, Ty'gor! Me kan still see you. - Dagg'um

name: Daniel Soortan
rules: Diplomacy: Dwarves (You pay 1 less to play Dwarf allies, to a minimum of 1.);[Exhaust] -> Target player puts the top two cards of his deck into his graveyard.
flavour: Humans and dwarves share a bond that has remained through countless conflicts.

name: Darbun Steppeheart
rules: Protector;War Stomp;(When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)

name: Defender Kaniya
rules: Protector;Nature Resistance (Prevent all nature or [Nature] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: If you want it, come and claim it

name: Doomsayer Din'ju
rules: When Din'ju enters play, turn all opposing resources face down.
flavour: Allow me to do dat voodoo dat I do so well!

name: Durgrin Ironedge
rules: When Durgrin enters play, you may exhaust target equipment. That Equipment can't ready during its controller's ready step while Durgrin remains in your party.
flavour: Ye dinna need to use it anyway, laddie! Ha ha!

name: Elementalist Psyrin
rules: Psyrin can't attack.;[Exhaust] -> Target ally has +3 ATK this turn.
flavour: I thought you could use the help.

name: Elizabeth Crowley
rules: 2, Discard a card -> Elizabeth heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: The Forsaken have their own unique way of mending the injured.

name: Enslaved Abyssal
rules: Fire Resistance;At the end of your turn, if you didn't play a Demon or Demonology card this turn, choose an opponent. He gains control of Enslaved Abyssal, and it loses this power.
flavour: Those types of friendships never last long.

name: Envoy Aiden LeNoir
rules: Diplomacy: Gnomes (You pay 1 less to play Gnome allies, to a minimum of 1.);1, [Exhaust] -> Draw a card.
flavour: Mechanical ingenuity is vital to the success of the Alliance. - Master Mathias Shaw

name: Envoy Samantha Dillon
rules: Diplomacy: Night Elves (You pay 1 less to play Night Elf allies, to a minimum of 1.);[Exhaust] -> Ready another target ally in your party. It can't attack this turn.
flavour: Since the Third War, the kaldorei have been a proud member of the Alliance.

name: Erindae Firestrider
rules: Once per turn: 1 -> Interrupt target card unless its controller pays 1.
flavour: Few are able to wield the many schools of magic with such ease.

name: Errzig Cogflicker
rules: Arcane Resistance (Prevent all arcane or [Arcane] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: You call that a spell? Let me show you how a real mage does it!

name: Falcore
rules: Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.);Shadowmeld (Elusive and Untargetable while ready.)
flavour: The trick is they shouldn't see the hunter until it's too late. - The Greatest Race of Hunters

name: Gakmat
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.) ; X, [Exhaust] -> Gakmat deals X fire damage to target ally and itself.
flavour: Can't we all just get along?

name: Gatlin Clouds-the-Sky
rules: Gatlin has Long-Range while attacking exhausted heroes and allies. (Defenders deal no combat damage to him.)
flavour: Nothing feels better than sending a volley into a group of dwarves.

name: Geoffrey Kimble
rules: Protector;3, Discard a card -> Destroy target ability or equipment.
flavour: Stop whining! You are soft, and you lack discipline!

name: Gryth Thurden, Gryphon Master
rules: Gryth has +1 ATK / +1 health while you have a location.;[Exhaust] -> Ready target location.
flavour: Speak with me when you're ready to go.

name: Helena Demonfire
rules: Diplomacy: Demons (You pay 1 less to play Demon allies, to a minimum of 1);Opposing heroes and allies have -1 ATK / -1 health for each Demon in your party.
flavour: Our pact would be mutually beneficial to all those involved.

name: High Tinker Mekkatorque
rules: At the start and end of your turn, draw a card for each Gnome in your party.
flavour: I trusted Thermaplugg. Never did I expect that he would betray us.

name: Himul Longstrider
rules: War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)
flavour: Anybody hear that? It's an…impact tremor, that's what it is…I'm fairly alarmed here. - Blaize Brightspark

name: Hissy
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.);When Hissy enters play, he deals 1 nature damage to target attacker.
flavour: Asps - very dangerous - you go first. - Zallah

name: Horkin Figluster
rules: War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target hero or ally.);When Horkin enters play, exhaust all opposing heroes and allies.

name: Jack Coor
rules: 1, Discard a card -> Jack deals 1 fire damage to each ally.
flavour: Anything that doesn't kill me makes you weaker.

name: Jee'zee
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.);Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)
flavour: Being quick to anger isn't necessarily a bad trait for a troll. - Vol'jin

name: Jil'ti
rules: Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.);1 -> Jil'ti has Long-Range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to her.)
flavour: Anger doesn't affect her aim; it only determines how hard the bowstring is plucked.

name: Johnny Rotten
rules: When Johnny enters play, he may deal 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.;Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow or [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

name: Keward Rocksalt
rules: Protector;Opposing allies have -1 health while Keward is defending.

name: Kileana Darkblaze
rules: When Kileana enters play, she deals 2 fire damage to your hero and each other ally in your party.
flavour: A warlock will make sure her task is completed, even if it means having to hurt both friend and foe.

name: Kinivus
rules: Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow or [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: Though he has not turned his back on the Light, he hears the call of the elements more clearly.

name: Kirga Earthguard
rules: Protector;At the end of your turn, ready Kirga.
flavour: Kirga learned from the best, her older sibling Kulan.

name: Kray'zin Firetusk
rules: Troll Hero Required;Berserking;When Kray'zin or another ally enters your party, you may put any amount of non-fatal damage on it.
flavour: Joo want to motivate someone, joo gotta light a fire under dere seat.

name: Lanthus of the Forest
rules: Shadowmeld (Elusive and Untargetable when ready.);[Exhaust] -> Exhaust target ally.
flavour: In Ashenvale, the trees aren't used just to hide from the rain.

name: Lifemender Dorn
rules: Once per turn: 1 -> Dorn heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Compared to the tauren, nature is a fragile creature. For us to live among it, we must practice restraint.

name: Logor Blackfist
rules: When Logor enters play, target opponent discards two cards if he has more cards in hand than you.
flavour: Your gluttony will be the end of you.

name: Lolly the Unsuspecting
rules: All targets are chosen at random.
flavour: What was that?

name: Loraala
rules: Loraala can't attack.;[Exhaust] -> Loraala deals 3 fire damage to target hero.
flavour: I do only one thing - but I do it so well.

name: Magnus Longbarrel
rules: 1, Destroy Magnus -> Turn target resource face down.
flavour: I've got ye in me sight, ya filthy horde animal…

name: Malicious Mallina
rules: As Mallina enters play, choose arcane, fire, frost, nature, or shadow.;Mallina has the chosen resistance.
flavour: Why would you ever go into combat without knowing what your opponent's plans are beforehand?

name: Meganna Callaghan
rules: Meganna can attack Elusive heroes and allies.
flavour: It is hard to hide from one who is familiar with the shadows.

name: Michael Garrett, Bat Handler
rules: When Michael enters play, reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed location card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: If you must travel a long distance, then a bat is your best option.

name: Mistress Naila Flameburst
rules: When Naila attacks, she deals 1 fire damage to each other hero and ally.
flavour: The quickest way to find the needle: burn the haystack. - Harrigan Soulsunder

name: Mollie Brightheart
rules: Diplomacy: Draenei (You pay 1 less to play Draenei allies, to a minimum of 1.);[Exhaust] -> Mollie deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Mortok
rules: Mortok can attack only exhausted heroes and allies.
flavour: Don't worry, I'll watch your back for you.

name: Munkin Blackfist
rules: Protector;When Munkin enters play, destroy target equipment if its controller has more equipment than you.
flavour: Greed is good.

name: Ninoo of the Light
rules: Ninoo can't attack.;[Exhaust] -> Ninoo heals 1 damage from each hero and ally in your party.
flavour: The light shines upon thee.

name: Nok'tal the Savage
rules: Protector;Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)
flavour: Is dat all you got?

name: Orion
rules: Protector
flavour: Taste blessed steel, cur!

name: Quakelord Razek Warhoof
rules: Tauren Hero Required;War Stomp;When Razek attacks or defends, target opponent exhausts each ability and equipment he controls.
flavour: It's probably just a herd of elekk. - Leeroy Jenkins

name: Rayne Savageboon
rules: Protector;Nature Resistance (Prevent all nature or [Nature] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: You've picked the wrong night elf to mess with.

name: Rensarth Shadowsun
rules: On your turn: 1, Put 1 damage on another ally in your party -> Target ally has -1 health this turn.
flavour: This will hurt a bit.

name: Roktar Blackfist
rules: When Roktar enters play, destroy target resource if its controller has more resources than you.
flavour: Vengeance will be mine!

name: Rula Blackfist
rules: When Rula enters play, remove target ally from the game if its controller has more allies than you.
flavour: It is nice of you to pander to my lust for violence.

name: Ryno the Short
rules: When Ryno enters play, put a Felhunter Demon ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.;1, Destroy a Demon in your party -> Interrupt target ability card.
flavour: This is a 'small' sample of what's to come.

name: Sanva
rules: War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)
flavour: A storm's approaching.

name: Sarn Earthtrembler
rules: Protector;War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.);You pay 1 less to play Sarn for each exhausted opposing hero and ally.

name: Sepirion
rules: Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage);When Sapirion attacks for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready him.
flavour: Joo are goin' ta have ta do betta dan dat, mon.

name: Skumm Bag'go
rules: When Skumm enters play, you may turn target resource face down.
flavour: I've sent in someone special to handle de peasants. She's de best dere is - supposedly. - Kuray'bin

name: Sorga the Swift
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.);War Stomp (When this ally attack or defends, you may exhaust opposing hero or ally.)
flavour: Ready or not...

name: Swordsmith Hanso
rules: Protector;Your weapons have +3 ATK.;Opposing weapons have -3 ATK.
flavour: You must have a target orc infestation if you need Hanso's steel.

name: The Hammerhand Brothers
rules: When The Hammerhead Brothers enters play, target opposing ally can't attack while The Hammerhead Brothers remains in your party.
flavour: Another round!

name: The Red Bearon
rules: The Red Bearon has +X ATK / +X health, where X is the combined DEF of your armor.
flavour: All who saw his color red would soon find themselves amongst the dead.

name: Tinker Art Seaclock
rules: Art has Long-Range while he's undamaged. Defenders deal no combat damage to him.
flavour: Any sufficiently intact technology is indistinguishable from magic!

name: Tinker Bixy Blue
rules: If Bixy is undamaged: [Exhaust] -> Target player discards a card and you draw a card.
flavour: This prototype will be worth a fortune! Assuming it passes the field test…

name: Tinker Burnfizzle
rules: If Burnfizzle is undamaged: [Exhaust] -> Burnfizzle deals 3 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: Take that! Err…shizbot! Hang on, I have to recalibrate the fire capacitor!

name: Tinker Casey Springlock
rules: Case is a Protector while she's undamaged.
flavour: This shield will stop anything… once.

name: Tonks the Tenacious
rules: Destroy Tonks -> Target hero or ally can't attack this turn.

name: Tormentor Emek
rules: On your turn: 3, Discard a card -> Target player discards a card.
flavour: It is your suffering that I enjoy the most.

name: Treewarden Tolven
rules: Protector;Shadowmeld (Elusive and Untargetable while ready.)
flavour: The fury of the bear and the will of this druid will be the death of you.

name: Tully Fiddlewit
rules: When Tully defends against an ally, discard a card.
flavour: How did I get myself into this situation?

name: Virkaltor
rules: 1, Destroy Virkaltor -> Destroy target ability.
flavour: I purge thee!

name: Vixton Pinchwhistle
rules: [Exhaust] -> Reveal the top three cards of your deck.;Put a revealed Arena card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: I got what you need.

name: Weldon Barov
rules: At the end of your turn, put three Peasant ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and Protector. At the end of the next turn, destroy them.
flavour: As the last living Barov, I have rightful claim to all of my family's holdings!

name: Woodsie Leafsong
rules: Shadowmeld (Elusive and Untargetable while ready.);When Woodsie deals combat damage to an opponent's defending hero, you may destroy target ability or equipment he controls.
flavour: Begone! You have no place here.

name: Wyler Surestrike
rules: Shadowmeld (Elusive and Untargetable while ready.);When Wyler deals combat damage to a defending ally, destroy that ally.
flavour: The shadows conceal the real threat.

name: Zari'zari
rules: Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)
flavour: Don't make me angry. Joo wouldn't like me when I'm angry.

name: Zempre, Grace of Elune
rules: Night Elf Hero Required;Shadowmeld;Prevent all damage that would be dealt to your hero while Zempre is exhausted.
flavour: The shadows offer shelter to their children.

name: Zi'mo
rules: Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)
flavour: The Darkspear thrive under pressure.

name: Zip
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
flavour: The cries of laughter upon seeing the tallstrider quickly turn to cries of pain.

name: Zophos
rules: Protector;When Zophos defends, he deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target attacking ally.
flavour: I left Exodar to search for my daughter, but all I found was more trouble.

name: Amani Mask of Death
rules: At the end of each turn, destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment with the same name as another card in play.
flavour: That's right at the top of my list of things I don't want to see before I die. - Pidge Filthfinder

name: Arcanite Dragonling
rules: 1 -> Arcanite Dragonling is also an ally with 2 [Melee] ATK / 2 health and Protector this turn.
flavour: The next best thing to an Onyxian Whelp

name: Black Amnesty
rules: Your hero has dual wield. ; 1, [Exhaust] -> If your hero is defending against an ally, remove your hero from combat.
flavour: This has gotten me out of a sticky situation more than once. - Umbrage

name: Bloodseeker
rules: When you strike with Bloodseeker, your hero has Long-Range this combat.;At the end of your turn, if no damage was dealt with Bloodseeker this turn, put 3 damage on your hero.
flavour: Blood is what it wants, and blood is what it'll get - one way or another.

name: Blue Diamond Witchwand
rules: When an opponent discards a card, put a +1 ATK counter on Blue Diamond Witchwand. ; When damage is dealt with Blue Diamond Witchwand, remove all +1 ATK counters from it.
flavour: It's more valuable than you might think. - Landro Longshot

name: Blue Suede Shoes
rules: When Blue Suede Shoes enters play, target card in play you control is Untargetable this turn.
flavour: Keep off!

name: Boots of the Resilient
rules: When youre hero is dealt damage, exhaust Boots of the Resilient.
flavour: Stout and sturdy - two things you want from your armor.

name: Cloak of Subjugated Power
rules: On your turn: 1, [Exhaust], Destroy an ally in your party with cost X ---> Gain control of target ally with cost less than X.
flavour: You're mine! You just don't know it yet… - Spiritualist Sunshroud

name: Cold Forged Hammer
rules: You pay 1 less to play Cold Forged Hammer for each [Frost] ally in your party.
flavour: Only those who survive the snowfields of Alterac Valley could hope to wield this uniquely crafted mace.

name: Continuum Blade
rules: At the start of each player's turn, if he didn't take the last turn, he takes an extra turn after this one.
flavour: It is our charge to preserve the sanctity of the time-stream. - Andormu

name: Electrified Dagger
rules: Destroy Electrified Dagger ---> Your hero deals 2 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target [Horde] heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Damned Frostwolf! Ye will not halt our sovereign imperialistic imperative! - Vandar Stormpike

name: Forest Stalker's Bracers
rules: 1 ---> Target hero or ally has Stealth this turn. (Can't protect against it.)
flavour: As if rogues needed more camouflage. - Spellweaver Jihan

name: Frostguard
rules: Allies in your party have Frost Resistance. (Prevent all frost or [Frost] damage that those allies would be dealt.)
flavour: The Scarlet Crusade may be evil mongrels, but they do know how best to stop the Scourge cold. - Lord Benjamin Tremendouson

name: Girdle of the Blasted Reaches
rules: When Girdle of the Blasted Reaches enters play, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom.
flavour: Forged on the edge of Hellfire Peninsula.

name: Glacial Blade
rules: Destroy Glacial Blade ---> Your hero deals 1 frost damage to target [Alliance] hero or ally. If a hero is dealt damage this way, its controller skips drawing his next card this turn.
flavour: Cursed Stormpike! We will rip you from our home! - Drek'Thar

name: Gladiator's Regalia
rules: Opposing allies lose and can't have powers.;[Exhaust] -> Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Gladiator's Spellblade
rules: At the start of your turn, put a spell counter on Gladiator's Spellblade. ;If your hero would deal damage, it deals that much +1 for each spell counter instead.
flavour: That ogre looks vicious, but I'm putting my money on the clever one. - Grikkin Copperspring

name: Ice Barbed Spear
rules: Each opponent can't draw cards unless he pays 1 for each card.
flavour: Dat's da chill of death you feel, mon. - Warmaster Bo'jo

name: Light's Justice
rules: When a [Holy] ally in your party deals damage, it also heals that much from your hero.
flavour: Light makes right!

name: Lohn'goron, Bow of the Torn-heart
rules: When you strike with Lohn'goron, your hero has Long-Range this combat. Exhaust an ally in your party -> It deals 1 ranged damage to target hero.
flavour: A gift from a forgotten friend…

name: Masquerade Gown
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target ally in your party becomes a copy of a second target ally in your party this turn.
flavour: The clothes make... whatever you want.

name: Medallion of the Alliance
rules: 1, Put Medallion of the Alliance on the bottom of your deck -> Interrupt target ability card that's targeting your hero if it was played by a [Horde] player.;(This item can prevent damage like an armor.)
flavour: Engraved on the back is an oath to the Alliance and its noble cause.

name: Medallion of the Horde
rules: 1, Put Medallion of the Horde on the bottom of your deck -> Interrupt target ability card that's targeting your hero if it was played by an [Alliance] player.;(This item can prevent damage like an armor.)
flavour: Etched on the back is a pledge to the Horde and its continued survival.

name: Merciless Gladiator's Battlegear
rules: If your hero would deal damage with a weapon, it deals double that much instead.;[Exhaust] -> Exhaust target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.
flavour: They might as well have strapped a balista to that warrior. - Grikkin Copperspring

name: Merciless Gladiator's Greatsword
rules: When Merciless Gladiator's Greatsword enters play or you strike with it, your hero deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: The relentless are the ones who get the fame and glory. - King Dond

name: Mok'Nathal Wildercloak
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, put a +1 DEF counter on Mok'Nathal Wildercloak.
flavour: Those who have been corrupted by Illidan are beyond redemption. - Leoroxx

name: Netherbane
rules: Cards in play you control can't be removed from the game.
flavour: If the axe doesn't kill you, the glow will definitely blind you.

name: Nyn'jah's Tabi Boots
rules: Other players can't use payment (->) powers during your turn.;You can use the payment powers of any cards in play during your turn (including opposing cards).
flavour: You'll get a kick out of this. - Nyn'jah

name: Rune of Metamorphosis
rules: Your Forms aren't destroyed by abilities you play. (You can still have only one card with Form(1) in play.)
flavour: One of the main tools that druids use to shift forms.

name: Scaled Breastplate of Carnage
rules: When an ally deals damage to another ally, destroy both of them.
flavour: I've slain dragons and demons! What are you compared to them? - Shaii

name: The Oathkeeper
rules: When The Oathkeeper enters play, choose an oath: I won't play cards; or I won't draw cards.;You can't break that oath.
flavour: Oaths it will keep. Anything else it will break. - Savin Lightguard

name: The Staff of Twin Worlds
rules: Other cards in play have their printed text a second time. (For example, if a card has the text, Allies have +1 ATK, treat it as though it says that twice.)
flavour: Double, double, toil and trouble.

name: Vengeful Gladiator's Bonecracker
rules: When a resource enters play under your control, put a +1 ATK counter on Vengeful Gladiator's Bonecracker.
flavour: Some arena contests last too long, which makes the crowd upset. We don't want an unhappy crowd. - Vixton Pinchwhistle

name: Vengeful Gladiator's Vestments
rules: When you play a finishing move, you may interrupt target card.;[Exhaust] -> Put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and ready.
flavour: A rogue in these vestments is as close to a sure bet as possible. - Ecton Brasstumbler

name: Veteran's Pendant
rules: If you win this game, you decide who goes first next game.
flavour: History is written by the winners.

name: Wand of Biting Cold
rules: When Wand of Biting Cold enters play, target hero or ally can't attack this turn.
flavour: Sooner or later, all who stand in my way must feel the icy touch of death. - Black Ice Fizzlefreeze

name: Boarguts the Impaler
rules: 3, Flip Boarguts -> Boarguts has +1 ATK this turn for each of your weapons.
flavour: Feed my steel with your gutless, spineless flesh!

name: Grand Marshal Goldensword
rules: On your turn: 5, Flip Goldensword -> Target ally deals holy damage to itself equal to its ATK.
flavour: Humanity must bring the Light to the darkest ends of Azeroth.

name: Justice Blindburn
rules: 3, Flip Blindburn -> When the next ally in your party is destroyed this turn, each opponent destroys an ally in his party.
flavour: Eye for an eye. Blood for blood. Therein lies true retribution.

name: Lord Benjamin Tremendouson
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Benjamin -> Opposing allies have -1 health this turn.
flavour: Aye…I am wondrous, fabulous, and marvelous all rolled into one! Huzzah!

name: Maleo the Blur
rules: 2, Flip Maleo -> This turn, Maleo is in cat form and has Form(1) until you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability. (+1 ATK while attacking in cat form.)
flavour: Beware of cat.

name: Martiana the Mindwrench
rules: 1, Flip Martiana -> Target player discards a card if he already discarded a card this turn.
flavour: I'll come for ye at your darkest hour.

name: Oakenclaw
rules: 1, Flip Oakenclaw -> This turn, Oakenclaw is in bear form and has Form (1) until you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability. (Is a Protector while in bear form.)
flavour: My heart will beat forever with my forest's pulse.

name: Pidge Filthfinder
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Pidge -> Look at target player's hand and remove a card in it from the game.
flavour: Secrets are for sharing.

name: Shaii, Strategist Supreme
rules: If Shaii is defending: [Exhaust], Flip Shaii -> Shaii deals 1 melee damage to target attacker.
flavour: Of course I saw you coming. How else could you have gotten so dangerously close?

name: Shalu Stormshatter
rules: 3, Flip Shalu -> Destroy target ability that's not attached to a friendly hero or ally.
flavour: Step through the storm and discover your true worth.

name: Sinthya Flabberghast
rules: 3, Flip Sinthya -> When Sinthya next deals combat damage to a hero or ally this turn, she also deals that much melee damage to a second target hero or ally.
flavour: I hope you brought more friends.

name: Spellweaver Jihan
rules: Flip Jihan -> The next time Jihan would deal damage with an ability this turn, she deals that much +1 instead.
flavour: The tapestries of magic are at my fingertips.

name: Spiritualist Sunshroud
rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Sunshroud -> Target player destroys an ally in his party.
flavour: We all begin in darkness - some of us just never leave it.

name: The Longeye
rules: On your turn: 5, Flip The Longeye -> Destroy target opposing ally if it has or shares the highest cost among opposing allies.
flavour: Bigger is not always better, mon.

name: Turane Soulpact
rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Turane, destroy X allies in your party -> Turane deals X shadow damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Sacrifice is a small price to pay for victory. Especially when someone else pays.

name: Umbrage
rules: 1, Flip Umbrage -> Remove target attacker from combat.
flavour: You'll only see me when I want you to…and I won't.

name: Velindra Sepulchre
rules: 1, Flip Velindra -> This turn, target ally can't attack or protect, loses and can't have powers, and is also a Sheep.
flavour: Speak your mind, Alliance fool; I would hear your last words.

name: Zorin of the Thunderhead
rules: On your turn: 5, Flip Zorin -> Zorin deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Like the storms that sweep across this land, I harness the power of the elements.

name: Auchindoun Spirit Towers
rules: When you draw a card, add a capture counter.;[Exhaust], Remove five capture counters -> Turn target resource face down.
flavour: If one is to acquire Spirit Shards, one must capture each Spirit Tower.

name: Darnassus
rules: Night Elf Hero Required;On your turn: 1, [Exhaust] -> Ready target Night Elf in your party. It can't attack this turn.
flavour: By the grace of Elune…

name: Halaa
rules: At the start of your turn, if you have more allies than each opponent, add a capture counter.;[Exhaust], Remove four capture counters -> Put four Halaani ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 Health.
flavour: Halaa is defenseless!

name: Hellfire Citadel
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a capture counter.;[Exhaust], Remove three capture counters -> Draw a card.
flavour: If you control the Outlook, Broken Hill, and the Stadium… you control Hellfire Peninsula.

name: Sen'jin Village
rules: Troll Hero Required; At the start of your turn, choose a Troll in your party, and it may heal 1 damage from itself.
flavour: Vol'jin relocated his people to this village on the coast of southern Durotar.

name: Silithus
rules: At the start of your turn, add capture counters equal to the combined cost of allies in your party.;[Exhaust], Remove 200 capture counters -> Gain control of all cards in play except heroes.
flavour: He who controls the silithyst controls Silithus.

name: Southshore
rules: On your turn: 1, [Exhaust] -> When target [Alliance] ally in your party next deals damage to an ally with lower cost this turn, draw a card.
flavour: The main supply center to the Battle of Alterac, Southshore is often under siege by the Horde.

name: Stormwind City
rules: Human Hero Required;If a Human ally is in your party: [Exhaust] -> You pay 2 less to play your next ally this turn.
flavour: A strong and sturdy fortress, fit for an empire. - Explorer's Guild Guide to the Eastern Kingdoms

name: Tarren Mill
rules: On your turn: 1, [Exhaust] -> When target [Horde] ally in your party next deals damage to an ally with higher cost this turn, draw a card.
flavour: Located between a river and the main road to the Alterac Mountains, Tarren Mill is often under fire from the Alliance passersby.

name: Thunder Bluff
rules: Tauren Hero Required;Tauren in your party have +1 health.
flavour: Composed of four towering mesas, Thunder Bluff is the home of the once nomadic tauren. - Explorer's Guild Guide to the Eastern Kingdoms

name: Towers of Eastern Plaguelands
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a capture counter.;[Exhaust], Remove four capture counters -> Each opposing hero deals 4 nature damage to itself.

name: Twin Spire Ruins
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a capture counter. ;On your turn, 2, [Exhaust], Remove two capture counters -> Put an ally card with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play.

name: A Rare Bean
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Choose a rarity, then reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with that rarity into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: You must search the dung for the digested remnants of the Nagrand caracoli. - Elementalist Lo'ap

name: Arena Master
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Each player chooses an ally in his party. If you chose the ally with the highest ATK, draw two cards.
flavour: Arr, me hearty! Now 'tis the time to truly prove your steel. - Short John Mithril

name: Bolstering Our Defenses
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Horde] card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: It will be a constant struggle here in the Plaguelands until we have fully driven back the forces of the alliance. - Emissary Gormok

name: Corruption of Earth and Seed
rules: You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each [Nature] ally in your party.;Pay 3 To complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: My quest here is to find those powerful enough to slay Theradras so we may recover Zaelar's remains before returning to Stonetalon. - Keeper Marandis

name: Enemies, Old and New
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. You may remove a counter from target card in play.
flavour: We cannot allow them a victory there, as Garadar would be next without a doubt. - Karrtog

name: Establishing New Outposts
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Alliance] card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: We will establish new fortifications to tighten the noose around our enemies. - Emissary Whitebeard

name: In Defense of Halaa
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. You may choose a counter on target card in play and add another of those counters on it.
flavour: Halaa is defenseless!

name: Order Must Be Restored
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Target opponent chooses an ally in his party. When that ally is destroyed this turn, draw a card.
flavour: Gather an army. Return to the Plagues with yor army and destroy the Blightcaller. - Highlord Bolvar Fordragon

name: Oshu'gun Crystal Powder
rules: If you control a location, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The crystalling powder from the mountain is infused within the earthen core of this region.

name: Outland Sucks!
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if an opponent has a Blood Elf, Draenei, or Demon in his party.
flavour: How am I supposed to make a living here with hellboars and demons and fel orcs attacking all the time? - Foreman Razelcraz

name: Revenge is Tasty
rules: Revenge is Tasty enters play exhausted.;Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: They've requested something special for his get well party, kaliri stew. - The Rokk

name: Scouring the Desert
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. You may shuffle your graveyard into your deck.
flavour: If I have your assistance, you must go into the desert and recover the silithyst and return it here. - Marshal Bluewall

name: Someone Else's Hard Work Pays Off
rules: On your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a unique Ethereal ally token named Cryo-Engineer Sha'heen into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and At the start of your turn, remove this token from the game. If you do, gain control of target ability or equipment.
flavour: Nothing's alive back behind us, right? - Cryo-Engineer Sha'heen

name: Soup for the Soul
rules: Soup for the Soul enters play exhausted.;Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: And I know a fellow cook when I see one! Would you like to help me out and get a cut of the profits? - The Rokk

name: Spirits of Auchindoun
rules: Turn one of your other face-up resources face down to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Should we succeed in gaining the spirits' favor, they will grant us a boon that will aid in our endeavors. - Exorcist Sullivan

name: Super Hot Stew
rules: Super Hot Stew enters play exhausted.;Pay 6 To complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards.
flavour: But you…remind me of my younger days; ready to take on the world with a sword in one hand and a skillet in the other. - The Rokk

name: The Final Message to the Wildhammer
rules: On your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. Put a Message item token into play with If your hero would be dealt damage, it's dealt that much +1 instead. At the start of your next turn, remove that item from the game.
flavour: Show thos dwarves that troll mean business! - Otho Moji'ko

name: The Last Barov
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if two or more allies have the same name.
flavour: A glorious day it is! Finally, the pockmark of house Barov eliminated and my fortune secure! - Weldon Barov

name: Slashdance
rules: Each player may dance the way he imagines his hero would dance. If he does, he may turn his hero face up.
flavour: What a feeling!

name: Ransack
rules: Destroy the card with the lowest cost among abilities, allies, and equipment in play. If two or more are tied, destroy all with that cost.
flavour: You won't be needing these.

name: Owned!
rules: Remove target ally from the game. Search its owner's deck, graveyard, hand, and party for all ally cards with the same name as that ally and remove them from the game.
flavour: Sit down!

name: Mystic Denial
rules: Interrupt target card.;Ongoing: When an opponent plays a card, destroy Mystic Denial. If you do, interrupt that card.
flavour: Let's see if this works on the third try. - Dizdemona

name: Merciless Gladiator's Greatsword
rules: When Merciless Gladiator's Greatsword enters play or you strike with it, your hero deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: The relentless are the ones who get the fame and glory. - King Dond

name: Detect Traps
rules: Choose ability, ally, or equipment, and then target player reveals his hand and discards all cards of that kind.
flavour: No surprises here.

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
rules: Protector;Other Tauren in your party have +10 health.
flavour: Ha! There's no need to coddle me, boy. I may be old, but I'm not helpless.

name: Black Amnesty
rules: Your hero has dual wield. ; 1, [Exhaust] -> If your hero is defending against an ally, remove your hero from combat.
flavour: This has gotten me out of a sticky situation more than once. - Umbrage

name: The Last Barov
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if two or more allies have the same name.
flavour: A glorious day it is! Finally, the pockmark of house Barov eliminated and my fortune secure! - Weldon Barov

name: The Red Bearon
rules: The Red Bearon has +X ATK / +X health, where X is the combined DEF of your armor.
flavour: All who saw his color red would soon find themselves amongst the dead.

name: Vengeful Gladiator's Bonecracker
rules: When a resource enters play under your control, put a +1 ATK counter on Vengeful Gladiator's Bonecracker.
flavour: Some arena contests last too long, which makes the crowd upset. We don't want an unhappy crowd. - Vixton Pinchwhistle

name: Vixton Pinchwhistle
rules: [Exhaust] -> Reveal the top three cards of your deck.;Put a revealed Arena card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: I got what you need.

name: Darnassus
rules: Night Elf Hero Required;On your turn: 1, [Exhaust] -> Ready target Night Elf in your party. It can't attack this turn.
flavour: By the grace of Elune…

name: Alexi Barov
rules: At the start of your turn, put three Peasant ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and Ferocity. At the end of the next turn, destroy them.
flavour: Bow your head in my presence. I am a noble, after all, and you are a copperless peasant.

name: Equalize
rules: Each player with more cards in play than you destroys cards in play he controls until he has the same number as you.
flavour: Let's level the playing field. - Boris Brightbeard

name: Hibernate
rules: Put target non-token ally into its owner's resource row face down, then exhaust it.
flavour: Let sleeping beasts lie. - Eriun Moonglow

name: Himul Longstrider
rules: War Stomp (When this ally attacks or defends, you may exhaust target opposing hero or ally.)
flavour: Anybody hear that? It's an…impact tremor, that's what it is…I'm fairly alarmed here. - Blaize Brightspark

name: Jack Coor
rules: 1, Discard a card -> Jack deals 1 fire damage to each ally.
flavour: Anything that doesn't kill me makes you weaker.

name: Penance
rules: Each aly deals holy damage to itself equal to its ATK.
flavour: Those who have wronged will pay dearly.

name: Stormwind City
rules: Human Hero Required;If a Human ally is in your party: [Exhaust] -> You pay 2 less to play your next ally this turn.
flavour: A strong and sturdy fortress, fit for an empire. - Explorer's Guild Guide to the Eastern Kingdoms

name: Swordsmith Hanso
rules: Protector;Your weapons have +3 ATK.;Opposing weapons have -3 ATK.
flavour: You must have a target orc infestation if you need Hanso's steel.

name: Thud!
rules: Exhaust target card in play. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Treewarden Tolven
rules: Protector;Shadowmeld (Elusive and Untargetable while ready.)
flavour: The fury of the bear and the will of this druid will be the death of you.

name: Weldon Barov
rules: At the end of your turn, put three Peasant ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and Protector. At the end of the next turn, destroy them.
flavour: As the last living Barov, I have rightful claim to all of my family's holdings!

name: Tormentor Emek
rules: On your turn: 3, Discard a card -> Target player discards a card.
flavour: It is your suffering that I enjoy the most.

name: Nok'tal the Savage
rules: Protector;Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)
flavour: Is dat all you got?

name: The Staff of Twin Worlds
rules: Other cards in play have their printed text a second time. (For example, if a card has the text, Allies have +1 ATK, treat it as though it says that twice.)
flavour: Double, double, toil and trouble.

name: Arcane Spikes
rules: Your hero deals X arcane damage to target ally.

name: Creeping Shadow
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached character.

name: Nature Unleashed
rules: Put five bear Ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and Protector.
flavour: The pain you suffer will be unbearable. - Grumpherys

name: High Tinker Mekkatorque
rules: At the start and end of your turn, draw a card for each Gnome in your party.
flavour: I trusted Thermaplugg. Never did I expect that he would betray us.

name: Lohn'goron, Bow of the Torn-heart
rules: When you strike with Lohn'goron, your hero has Long-Range this combat. Exhaust an ally in your party -> It deals 1 ranged damage to target hero.
flavour: A gift from a forgotten friend…
